text: The vice president for two-and-a-half of those years, Mr. Vice President, tell us, what did you do to try and spur on the Justice Department to act in the Garner case?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Mayor.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Mayor de Blasio.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Vice President Biden, you can respond to that.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We did a lot.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Number one, we made sure we reduced the federal prison population by 38,000 people, number one.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Number two, we, in fact, insisted that we change the rules that police engage in.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: They had to have -- we provided for body cameras.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We made sure -- there were a lot of things that were changed in the process, but 38,000 people in the federal system were released under the system.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And so the fact is that there's a lot we've done.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: But here's the deal.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: The fact is that we're talking about things that occurred a long, long time ago.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And now, all of a sudden, you know -- I find it fascinating.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Everybody is talking about how terrible I am on these issues.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Barack Obama knew exactly who I was.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: He had 10 lawyers do a background check on everything about me on civil rights and civil liberties, and he chose me, and he said it was the best decision he made.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I'll take his judgment.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Mr. Vice President.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: May I, please?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Mr. Yang, your response?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I speak for just about everyone watching when I say I would trust anyone on this stage much more than I would trust our current president on matters of criminal justice.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We cannot tear each other down.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We have to focus on beating Donald Trump in 2020.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I want to share a story that a prison guard, a corrections officer in New Hampshire said to me.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: He said, we should pay people to stay out of jail, because we spend so much when they're behind bars.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Right now, we think we're saving money, we just end up spending the money in much more dark and punitive ways.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We should put money directly into people's hands, certainly when they come out of prison, but before they go into prison.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Mr. Yang.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I want to bring in Senator Gillibrand.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: You heard earlier Mayor de Blasio respond to Secretary Castro on the question of why the police officer who killed Eric Garner is still on the NYPD.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Was that response adequate?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Please respond.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: No.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: He should be fired.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: He should be fired now.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I sat -- I sat down with Eric Garner's mother.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And I can tell you, when you've lost your son, when he begged for breath, when you know because you have a video, when you know he said \"I can't breathe\" so many times, over and over again, when you know he used an illegal chokehold, that person should be fired.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And as -- if I was -- if I was the mayor, I would fire him.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: But as president, I would make sure that we had a full investigation, that the report would be made public.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And if I wasn't satisfied, we would have a consent decree.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I want to bring in Senator Harris now.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Senator Harris, you have also been quite critical of Vice President Biden's policies on race, specifically on the issues of busing in the 1970s, having benefitted from busing when you were a young child.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Vice President Biden says that your current position on busing, you're opposed to federally mandated busing, that that position is the same as his position.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Is he right?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: That is simply false.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And let's be very clear about this.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: When Vice President Biden was in the United States Senate, working with segregationists to oppose busing, which was the vehicle by which we would integrate America's public schools, had I been in the United States Senate at that time, I would have been completely on the other side of the aisle.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And let's be clear about this.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Too little, too late is too dangerous.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Had those segregationists their way, I would not be a member of the United States Senate, Cory Booker would not be a member of the United States Senate, and Barack Obama would not have been in the position to nominate him to the title he now holds.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And so, on that issue, we could not be more apart, which is that the vice president has still failed to acknowledge that it was wrong to take the position that he took at that time.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Now, I would like to also talk about this conversation about Eric Garner, because I, too, met with his mother.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And one of the things that we've got to be clear about is that this president of the United States, Donald Trump, while he has been in office, has quietly been allowing the United States Department of Justice to shut down consent decrees, to stop pattern and practice investigations.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: On that case, we also know that the...
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Senator.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: ... Civil Rights Division -- this is important.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: The Civil Rights Division of the United States Department of Justice said charges should have been filed, but this United States Department of Justice usurped -- and I believe it is because that president did not want those charges to go forward.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And they overrode a decision by the Civil Rights Division of the United States Department of Justice.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Senator.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Under my administration, the Civil Rights Division...
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Senator.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: ... will rein and there will be independent investigations.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Vice President Biden, Vice President Biden, I want to give you a chance to respond to what Senator Harris just said.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: When Senator Harris was attorney general for eight years in the state of California, there were two of the most segregated school districts in the country, in Los Angeles and in San Francisco.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And she did not -- I didn't see a single solitary time she brought a case against them to desegregate them.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Secondly, she also was in a situation where she had a police department when she was there that in fact was abusing people's right.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And the fact was that she in fact was told by her own people that her own staff that she should do something about and disclose to defense attorney's like me that you in fact have been -- the police officer did something that did not give you information of what  your -- your client.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: She didn't do that.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: She never did it.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And so what happened.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Along came a federal judge and said enough, enough.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And he freed 1,000 of these people.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: If you doubt me, google 1,000 prisoners freed, Kamala Harris.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Vice President Biden.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Senator Harris, your response.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: That is -- is simply not true.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And as attorney general of California where I ran the second largest Department of Justice in the United States, second only to the United States Department of Justice, I am proud of the work we did.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Work that has received national recognition for what has been the important work of reforming a criminal justice system and cleaning up the consequences of the bills that you passed when you were in the United States Senate for decades.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: It was the work of creating the -- one of the first in the nation initiatives around reentering former offenders and getting them jobs and counseling.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Senator.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I did the work as attorney general of putting body cameras on special agents in the state of California.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I want to bring in Congresswoman ....
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And I'm proud of that work.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I want to bring in Congresswoman Gabbard.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Congresswoman Gabbard, you took issue with Senator Harris confronting Vice President Biden at the last debate.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: You called it a quote, false accusation that Joe Biden is a racist.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: What's your response?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I want to bring the conversation back to the broken criminal justice system that is disproportionately negatively impacting black and brown people all across this country today.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Now Senator Harris says she's proud of her record as a prosecutor and that she'll be a prosecutor president.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: But I'm deeply concerned about this record.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: There are too many examples to cite but she put over 1,500 people in jail for marijuana violations and then laughed about it when she was asked if she ever smoked marijuana.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We will end any subsidies for coal or any other fossil fuel.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: She blocked evidence -- she blocked evidence that would have freed an innocent man from death row until the courts forced her to do so.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: She kept people in prison beyond their sentences to use them as cheap labor for the state of California.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And she fought to keep ...
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Congresswoman.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Bail system in place that impacts poor people in the worst kind of way.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Congresswoman.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Senator Harris, your response?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: As the elected attorney general of California, I did the work of significantly reforming the criminal justice system of a state of 40 million people, which became a national model for the work that needs to be done.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And I am proud of that work.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And I am proud of making a decision to not just give fancy speeches or be in a legislative body and give speeches on the floor, but actually doing the work of being in the position to use the power that I had to reform a system that is badly in need of reform.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: That is why we created initiatives that were about reentering former offenders and getting them counseling.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: It is why and because I know that criminal justice system is so broken ...
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Senator.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: That I am an advocate for what we need to do to not only decriminalize, but legalize marijuana in the United States.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Senator.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Your time is up.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I want to -- I want to bring Congresswoman Gabbard back in.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Your response, please.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: The bottom line is, Senator Harris, when you were in a position to make a difference and an impact in these people's lives, you did not.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And worse yet, in the case of those who were on death row, innocent people, you actually blocked evidence from being revealed that would have freed them until you were forced to do so.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: There is no excuse for that and the people who suffered under your reign as prosecutor owe -- you owe them an apology.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Senator Harris?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: My entire career I have been opposed -- personally opposed to the death penalty and that has never changed.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And I dare anybody who is in a position to make that decision, to face the people I have faced to say I will not seek the death penalty.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: That is my background, that is my work.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I am proud of it.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I think you can judge people by when they are under fire and it's not about some fancy opinion on a stage but when they're in the position to actually make a decision, what do they do.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: When I was in the position of having to decide whether or not to seek a death penalty on cases I prosecuted, I made a very difficult decision that was not popular to not seek the death penalty.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: History shows that and I am proud of those decisions.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Senator Harris, thank you very much.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Senator Bennet, a question for you.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Why are you the best candidate to heal the racial divide that exists in this country today, which has been stoked by the president's racist rhetoric?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Yes.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: First of all, the president's racist rhetoric should be enough grounds for everybody in this country to vote him out of office.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: That one thing alone should be enough.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Second, Don, I want to answer your question by tagging on the conversation we were just having.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: This is the fourth debate that we have had and the second time that we have been debating what people did 50 years ago with busing...
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: ... when our schools are as segregated today as they were 50 years ago.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We need a conversation about what's happening now.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And when there's a group of kids in this country that don't get preschool through no fault of their own and another group does, equal is not equal.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And we've got a group of K-12 schools that are good because families can spend a million bucks, and you've got the Detroit public schools that are as segregated as they were.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Equal is not equal.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And let me tell you something else, Don.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I believe you can draw a straight line from slavery through Jim Crow through the banking and the redlining to the mass incarceration that we were talking about on this stage a few minutes ago.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: But you know what other line I can draw?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Eighty-eight percent of the people in our prisons dropped out of high school.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Let's fix our school system and maybe we can fix the prison pipeline that we have.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Senator Bennet.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Governor Inslee, what's your response?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Governor Inslee, please respond.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: You know, I approach this question with humility because I have not experienced what many Americans have.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I've never been a black teenager pulled over in a white neighborhood.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I've never been a woman talked over in a meeting.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I've never been an LGBTQ member subject to a slur.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And so I have believed I have an added responsibility, a double responsibility, to deal with racial disparity.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And we've talked on the way we do it, including ending -- ending the school to prison pipeline in my state.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: But I want to say this.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I want to say very clearly -- thank you, man.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And this is a common error that every single senator on this stage, as much as I respect them all -- they all have an enormous error which is going to prevent our party from making any progressive progress in the United States, and it is this.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We are all going to work like the dickens to get more Democrats elected to the Senate, right?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We are going to do that.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And I hope we're going to succeed.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: But if we get a majority in the U.S. Senate, because of the position of these senators, not a damn thing is going to get done.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And I'll tell you why.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: With all their good intentions -- and I know they're very sincere and passionate and I respect them enormously -- but because they embraced this antediluvinal  super-majority thing called the filibuster, Mitch McConnell is going to run the U.S. Senate even if we take a majority.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We've got to get rid of the filibuster so we can govern the United States.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Mister...
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Mr. Yang, why are you the best candidate to heal the racial divide in America -- your response?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I spent seven years running a non-profit that helped create thousands of jobs, including hundreds right here in Detroit, as well as Baltimore, Cleveland, New Orleans.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And I saw that the racial disparities are much, much worse than I had ever imagined.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: They're even worse still.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: A study just came out that projected the average African-American median net worth will be zero by 2053.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: So you have to ask yourself, how is that possible?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: It's possible because we're in the midst of the greatest economic transformation in our history.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Artificial intelligence is coming.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: It's going to displace hundreds of thousands of call center workers, truck drivers -- the most common job in 29 states, including this one.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And you know who suffers most in a natural disaster?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: It's people of color, people who have lower levels of capital and education and resources.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: So what are we going to do about it?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We should just go back to the writings of Martin Luther King, who in 1967, his book \"Chaos or Community\", said \"We need a guaranteed minimum income in the United States of America.\"
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: That is the most effective way for us to address racial inequality in a genuine way and give every American a chance in the 21st Century economy.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Mr. Yang, thank you very much.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Secretary Castro, after the president's racist tweets attacking Baltimore and Congressman Elijah Cummings, the mayor of Baltimore slammed the tweets and said to the president -- and I quote here -- \"Help us.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Send the resources that we need to rebuild America.\"
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: So what would you do for Baltimore and other cities that need help?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: First of all, the president is a racist, and that was just one more example of it.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We know that, whether it's Baltimore or cities like Detroit, they have -- they're tremendously rich in history and culture and also in possibility.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Here's what I would do if I'm president.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Number one, I would invest in tremendous educational opportunity; invest in universal pre-K for three and four-year-olds; invest in improving K-12 education and also making higher education available to everyone through tuition-free public state universities, community colleges and job training and certification programs.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I would follow-up on the work that I did at HUD.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We passed the most sweeping rule to further desegregate our communities in the United States.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: This Trump administration set that back.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I would put that back in order.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I would also invest in housing that is affordable, because folks know that the rent is going through the roof.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And we need to make sure that you don't have to get out of West Baltimore, or Inner City Detroit, or the west side of San Antonio, or anywhere, if you want to reach your American dream.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I want you to be able to accomplish it in your great neighborhood where you are.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Secretary Castro.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Senator Gillibrand, what's your response?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: So I don't believe that it's the responsibility of Cory and Kamala to be the only voice that takes on these issues of institutional racism, systemic racism in our country.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: I think as a white woman of privilege, who is a U.S. senator, running for president of the United States, it is also my responsibility to lift up those voices that aren't being listened to.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And I can talk to those white women in the suburbs that voted for Trump and explain to them what white privilege actually is, that when their son is walking down a street with a bag of M&Ms in his pocket, wearing a hoodie, his whiteness is what protects him from not being shot.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: When his - when her - when their child has a car that breaks down, and he knocks on someone's door for help, and the door opens, and the help is given, it's his whiteness that protects him from being shot.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: That is what white privilege in America is today.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And so, my responsibility's to only lift up those stories, but explain to communities across America, like I did in Youngstown, Ohio, to a young mother, that this is all of our responsibilities, and that together we can make our community stronger.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you, Senator Gillibrand.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Let's now turn to the issue of the climate crisis.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: The United Nations says the world needs to cut all carbon emissions by 2050 or risk facing disastrous consequences.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Thank you.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Governor Inslee, many of your fellow democratic candidates say that climate change is the biggest existential threat facing the country.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: You, though, are calling it the number one priority in your campaign.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: What do you know that the others don't?
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Well, I know the firsthand terrific impact of climate change on Americans across the country already.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: The family who I saw, with their aluminum home now, just a pile of molten aluminum, they lost everything in the paradise of fires; the non-profit in Davenport that was washed away in the floods.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: We have to act now.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: Look, climate change is not a singular issue, it is all the issue that we Democrats care about.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: It is health.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: It is national security.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: It is our economy.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And we know this; middle ground solutions, like the vice president has proposed, or sort of middling average-sized things, are not going to save us.
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: And we have to have a bold plan, and mine has been called the \"gold standard.\"
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (A)

text: \"For a price that I could pay for, on a part-time waitressing job, I got to finish my four-year degree and I became a special-needs teacher.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And after law school, my first big job was back here in Houston.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"By then, I had two little kids, and when child care nearly brought me down, my Aunt Bee moved in and saved us all.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: The paths to America's middle class have gotten a lot smaller and a lot narrower.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Today, service members are preyed upon by predatory lenders.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Students are crushed by debt.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And families cannot afford child care.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I know what's broken.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I know how to fix it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And I'm going to lead the fight to get it done.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Vice President Joe Biden.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You know, when President Kennedy announced the moon shot, he used a phrase that sticks with me my whole life.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"He said, we're doing it because we refuse to postpone.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Well, I refuse to postpone one more minute spending billions of dollars on curing cancer, Alzheimer's, and other diseases which, if we invest in them, we can find cures.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I refuse to postpone giving single child in America, no matter their Zip code, pre-K all the way through high school and beyond.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I refuse to postpone any longer taking on climate change and leading the world in taking on climate change.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, this is the United States of America.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: There has never been a single solitary time when we've set our mind to something we've been unable to do it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We're walking around with our heads down like woe is me.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We're the best-equipped nation in the world to take this on.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's no longer time to postpone.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We should get moving.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"There's enormous, enormous opportunities once we get rid of Donald Trump.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Candidates, thank you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Several of you said you are more united than divided, and that is certainly true.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"All of you agree on one big thing, the goal of defeating President Trump, driving the country in a new direction.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But out on the campaign trail, you have outlined big differences over how far to go and how fast to go.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And, Vice President Biden, the differences between you and the senators on either side of you tonight strike at the heart of this primary debate.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Both senators Warren and Sanders want to replace Obamacare with Medicare-for-all.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You want to build on Obamacare, not scrap it.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They propose spending far more than you to combat climate change and tackle student loan debt.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And they would raise more in taxes than you to pay for their programs.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Are Sens.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Warren and Sanders pushing too far beyond where Democrats want to go and where the country needs to go?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That will be for the voters to decide that question.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Let me tell you what I think.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I think we should have a debate on health care.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I think  I know that the senator says she's for Bernie, well, I'm for Barack.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I think the Obamacare worked.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I think the way we add to it, replace everything that has been cut, add a public option, guarantee that everyone will be able to have affordable insurance, number one.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Number two, I think we should be in a position of taking a look at what costs are.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: My plan for health care costs a lot of money.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It costs $740 billion.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"It doesn't cost $30 trillion, $3.4 trillion a year, it turns out, is twice what the entire federal budget is.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"That's before  exists now, without interest on the debt.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: How are we going to pay for it?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want to hear that tonight how that's happened.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Thus far, my distinguished friend, the senator on my left, has not indicated how she pays for it.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And the senator has, in fact, come forward and said how he's going to pay for it, but it gets him about halfway there.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: There's a lot of other things that need to be done.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I have a bold plan to deal with making sure we triple the money for at-risk schools that are Title I schools, from 15 to $45 billion a year.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But I go down the line and these are things we're talking about, I lay out how I can pay for it, how I can get it done, and why it's better.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Sen. Warren, let me take that to you, particularly on what Sen. Biden was saying there about health care.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"He has actually praised Bernie Sanders for being candid about his health care plan, that senator  says that Sanders has been candid about the fact that middle class taxes are going to go up and most of private insurance is going to be eliminated.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Will you make that same admission?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So, let's be clear about health care.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And let's actually start where vice president did.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We all owe a huge debt to President Obama, who fundamentally transformed health care in America and committed this country to health care for every human being.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And now the question is, how best can we improve on it?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And I believe the best way we can do that is we make sure that everybody gets covered by health care at the lowest possible cost.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: How do we pay for it?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Come on.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We pay for it, those at the very top, the richest individuals and the biggest corporations, are going to pay more.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And middle-class families are going to pay less.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's how this is going to work.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Direct question.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You said middle-class families are going to pay less.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: But will middle-class taxes go up to pay for the program?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I know you believe that the deductibles and the premiums will go down.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Will middle-class taxes go up?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Will private insurance be eliminated?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, what families have to deal with is cost, total cost.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's what they have to deal with.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And understand, families are paying for their health care today.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Families pay every time an insurance company says, Sorry, you can't see that specialist.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Every time an insurance company says, Sorry, that doctor is out of network.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Sorry, we are not covering that prescription.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Families are paying every time they don't get a prescription filled because they can't pay for it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They don't have a lump checked out because they can't afford the co-pay.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"What we're talking about here is what's going to happen in families' pockets, what's going to happen in their budgets.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And the answer is on Medicare-for-all, costs are going to go up for wealthier individuals and costs are going to go up for giant corporations.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But for hard-working families across this country, costs are going to go down and that's how it should work under Medicare-for-all in our health care system.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Sen. Sanders, you were invoked by the vice president, also take on that question about taxes.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Well, Joe said that Medicare-for-all would cost over $30 trillion.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"That's right, Joe.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Status quo over 10 years will be $50 trillion.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Every study done shows that Medicare-for-all is the most cost-effective approach to providing health care to every man, woman, and child in this country.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I, who wrote the damn bill, if I may say so...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"... intend to eliminate all out-of-pocket expenses, all deductibles, all co-payments.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Nobody in America will pay more than $200 a year for prescription drugs, because we're going to stand up to the greed and corruption and price-fixing of the pharmaceutical industry.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We need  we need a health-care system that guarantees health care to all people as every other major country does, not a system which provides $100 billion a year in profit for the drug companies and the insurance companies.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And I'll tell you how absurd the system is tonight on ABC, the health-care industry will be advertising, telling you how bad Medicare-for-all is, because they want to protect their profits.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That is absurd.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Vice president Biden...\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If I could respond, George.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You get a response and then we're going to broaden out the discussion.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Okay, number one, my health care plan does significantly cut the costs of  the largest out-of-pocket payment you'll pay is $1,000.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You'll be able to get into a  anyone who can't afford it gets automatically enrolled in the Medicare-type option we have, et cetera.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: But guess what?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Of the 160 million people who like their health care now, they can keep it.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If they don't like it, they can leave.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Number two, the fact of the matter is, we're in a situation where, if you notice, he hasn't answered the question.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"This is about candor, honesty, big ideas.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Let's have a big idea.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The tax of 2 percent that the senator is talking about, that raises about $3 billion.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Guess what?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That leaves you $28 billion short.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The senator said before, it's going to cost you in your pay  there will be a deductible, in your paycheck.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You're going to  the middle class person, someone making 60 grand with three kids, they're going to end up paying $5,000 more.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They're going to end up paying 4 percent more on their income tax.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's a reality.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Now, it's not a bad idea if you like it.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I don't like it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Okay, now I want everybody to keep to the time, but you did invoke both senators.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I have to get responses from them...\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Sure, no, that's good.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: ... and then we will broaden it out.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Warren, you go first.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So, let's be clear, I've actually never met anybody who likes their health insurance company.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I've met people who like their doctors.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I've met people who like their nurses.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I've met people who like their pharmacists.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I've met people who like their physical therapists.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: What they want is access to health care.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I've been there.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And we just need to be clear about what Medicare-for-all is all about.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Instead of paying premiums into insurance companies and then having insurance companies build their profits by saying no to coverage, we're going to do this by saying, everyone is covered by Medicare-for-all, every health care provider is covered.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And the only question here in terms of difference is where to send the bill?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Senator Sanders.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Let us be clear, Joe, in the United States of America, we are spending twice as much per capita on health care as the Canadians or any other major country on earth.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: This is America.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Yes, but Americans don't want to pay twice as much as other countries.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And they guarantee health care to all people.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Under my Medicare-for-all proposal, when you don't pay out-of-pocket and you don't pay premiums, maybe you've run into people who love their premiums, I haven't.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"What people want is cost-effective health care, Medicare-for-all will save the average American substantial sums of money on his or her health care bill.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Klobuchar, you said in your opening statement you don't  you want to represent the people stuck in the middle of the extremes.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Who represents the extreme on this stage?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I think you know that I don't agree with some of these proposals up here, George, so I'm talking about...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Which ones?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: If I could  if I could respond to some of the proposals from my friends.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"First of all, Senator Sanders and I have worked valiantly to bring down the cost of pharmaceuticals.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That was a Klobuchar-Sanders Amendment to allow for drugs to come in from less expensive countries like Canada.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We have worked to bring down the cost by fighting to allow 43 million seniors, that's a bill I lead, to negotiate for better prices under Medicare.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I figure that's a lot of seniors and they should be allowed to get a better price.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But when it comes to our health care and when it comes to our premiums, I go with the doctor's creed, which is, do no harm.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And while Bernie wrote the bill, I read the bill.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And on page eight  on page eight of the bill, it says that we will no longer have private insurance as we know it.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And that means that 149 million Americans will no longer be able to have their current insurance.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's in four years.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I don't think that's a bold idea, I think it's a bad idea.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And what I favor is something that what Barack Obama wanted to do from the very beginning.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And that is a public option.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"A non-profit choice that would bring down the cost of insurance, cover 12 million more people, and bring down the prices for 13 million more people.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That is a bold idea.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Warren, page eight of the bill, she says, 149 people will lose their health insurance.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I'm sorry.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"She said, page eight of the bill, 149 million people will lose their health insurance.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Current health insurance.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: One hundred forty-nine million.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Million, excuse me.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: So let's be clear about this.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"People will have access to all of their doctors, all of their nurses, their community hospitals, their rural hospitals.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Doctors won't have to hire people to fill out crazy forms.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They won't have to spend time on the phone arguing with insurance companies.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: People who have sick family members won't have to get into these battles.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: What this is about is making sure that we have the most efficient way possible to pay for health care for everyone in this country.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Insurance companies last year sucked $23 billion in profits out of the system.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: How did they make that money?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Every one of those $23 billion was made by an insurance company saying no to your health care coverage.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Mayor Buttigieg?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The problem, Senator Sanders, with that damn bill that you wrote, and that Senator Warren backs, is that it doesn't trust the American people.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I trust you to choose what makes the most sense for you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Not my way or the highway.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Now look, I think we do have to go far beyond tinkering with the ACA.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I propose Medicare-for-all who want it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We take a version of Medicare, we make it available for the American people, and if we're right, as progressives, that that public alternative is better, then the American people will figure that out for themselves.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I trust the American people to make the right choice for them.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Why don't you?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Sanders, 45 seconds.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"George, you talked about, was it 150 million people on private insurance?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Fifty million of those people lose their private insurance every year when they quit their jobs or they go unemployed or their employer changes their insurance policy.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Medicare-for-all is comprehensive health care.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Covers all basic needs, including home health care.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"It allows you to go to any doctor you want, which many private insurance company programs do not.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So, if you want comprehensive health care, freedom of choice regarding doctor or hospital, no more than $200 a year for prescription drugs, taking on the drug companies and the insurance companies, moving to Medicare-for-all is the way to go.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Harris, you startled out co-sponsoring Senator Sanders's bill, you now say you're uncomfortable with it.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Why?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want to give credit first to Barack Obama for really bringing us this far.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We would not be here if he hadn't the courage, the talent, or the will to see us this far.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want to give credit to Bernie.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Take credit, Bernie.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You know, you brought us this far on Medicare-for-all.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I support Medicare-for-all, I always have, but I wanted to make the plan better, which I did.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Which is about offering people choice, not taking that from them.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So, under my Medicare-for-all plan, people have the choice of a private plan or a public plan, because that's what people want.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And I agree, we shouldn't take choice from people.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: But here's the thing.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Everybody on this stage, I do believe, is well intentioned and wants that all Americans have coverage and recognizes that right now 30 million Americans don't have coverage.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But at least five people have talked, some repeatedly on this subject, and not once have we talked about Donald Trump.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: So let's talk about the fact that Donald Trump came into office and spent almost the entire first year of his term trying to get rid of the Affordable Care Act.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We all fought against it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And then the late, great John McCain, at that moment at about 2 o'clock in the morning, killed his attempt to take health care from millions of people in this country.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Fast forward to today, and what is happening?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Donald Trump's Department of Justice is trying to get rid of the Affordable Care Act.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"There was a fact check of that, and they said that was true.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Donald Trump's administration is trying to get rid of the ban that we placed on denying people who have pre-existing conditions coverage.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Donald Trump is trying to say that our kids up to the age of 26 can no longer be on our plans.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And frankly, I think this discussion has given the American public a headache.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: What they want to know is that they're going to have health care and cost will not be a barrier to getting it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: But let's focus on the end goal.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If we don't get Donald Trump out of office, he's going to get rid of all of it.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"George, 15 seconds?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Fifteen seconds?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Let me get to Congressman O'Rourke and then bring you  go ahead, Mr. Vice President.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Fifteen seconds.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, everybody says we want an option.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: The option I'm proposing is Medicare-for-all  Medicare for choice.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If you want Medicare, if you lose the job from your insurance  from your employer, you automatically can buy into this.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You don't have  no pre-existing condition can stop you from buying in.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You get covered, period.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And if you notice, nobody's yet said how much it's going to cost the taxpayer.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I hear this large savings, the president thinks  my friend from Vermont thinks that the employer's going to give you back if you negotiated as a union all these years, got a cut in wages because you got insurance.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They're going to give back that money to the employee?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"As a matter of fact, they will in our bill.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Well, let me tell you something.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"For a socialist, you've got  for a socialist, you've got a lot more confidence in corporate America than I do.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Senator Sanders?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Okay, one minute, George?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Go ahead.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: All right.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Two points.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You got to defend the fact that today not only do we have 87 million people uninsured and underinsured, you got to defend the fact that 500,000 Americans are going bankrupt.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You know why they're going bankrupt?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Because they suffered a terrible disease  cancer or heart disease.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Under my legislation, people will not go into financial ruin because they suffered with a diagnosis of cancer.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And our program is the only one that does that.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I know a lot about cancer, let me tell you something.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's personal to me.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Let me tell you something.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Every single person who is diagnosed with cancer or any other disease can automatically become part of this plan.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They will not go bankrupt because of that.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They will not go bankrupt because of that.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They can join immediately.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And we're talking four, six, eight, ten years, depending on who you talk about, before we get to Medicare-for-all.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You've been there.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You know what it's like.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"People need help now, hope now, and do something now.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Congressman O'Rourke?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Yeah.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Thank you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Listen, I'm grateful that we all agree about the urgency of this challenge and the fact that Donald Trump is undermining the limited protections that we have right now.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But I also think we're being offered a false choice between those who propose an all-or-nothing gambit, forcing tens of millions off of insurance that they like, that works for them, to force them onto Medicare, and others who want to, as the vice president does, incrementally improve what we have, which will still leave many, maybe millions uninsured and uncared for.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"In a state like Texas, where the largest provider of mental health care services is the county jail system, we've got to do better.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"In my proposal, Medicare for America, says everyone who's uninsured will be enrolled in Medicare.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Everyone who's insufficiently insured, cannot afford it, can move over to Medicare.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And those, like members of unions who've fought for the health care plans that work for them and their families, are able to keep them.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: This is the best possible path forward.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You just described my plan.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: This is  health care is the top issue for everyone in the country.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want to make sure everyone gets one minute to respond.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So, Secretary Castro, Andrew Yang, and then Senator Booker, you will get a minute.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Thank you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And, you know, I also want to recognize the work that Bernie has done on this.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And, of course, we owe a debt of gratitude to President Barack Obama.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Of course, I also worked for President Obama, Vice President Biden, and I know that the problem with your plan is that it leaves 10 million people uncovered.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Now, on the last debate stage in Detroit, you said that wasn't true, when Senator Harris brought that up.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You know, I grew up with a grandmother who had type 2 diabetes, and I watched her condition get worse and worse.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But that whole time, she had Medicare.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want every single American family to have a strong Medicare plan available.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If they choose to hold on to strong, solid private health insurance, I believe they should be able to do.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But the difference between what I support and what you support, Vice President Biden, is that you require them to opt in and I would not require them to opt in.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They would automatically be enrolled.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They wouldn't have a buy in.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"That's a big difference, because Barack Obama's vision was not to leave 10 million people uncovered.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: He wanted every single person in this country covered.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: My plan would do that.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Your plan would not.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They do not have to buy in.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They do not have to buy in.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You just said that.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You just said that two minutes ago.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You just two minutes ago that they would have to buy in.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Do not have to buy in if you can't afford it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You said they would have to buy in.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Your grandmother would not have to buy in.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If she qualifies for Medicaid, she would automatically be enrolled.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Are you forgetting what you said two minutes ago?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Are you forgetting already what you said just two minutes ago?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I mean, I can't believe that you said two minutes ago that they had to buy in and now you're saying they don't have to buy in.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You're forgetting that.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I said anyone like your grandmother who has no money.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I mean, look, look, we need a health care system...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: She  you're automatically enrolled.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It automatically enrolls people regardless of whether they choose to opt in or not.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If you lose your job, for instance, his health care plan would not automatically enroll you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You would have to opt in.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: My health care plan would.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's a big difference.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I'm fulfilling the legacy of Barack Obama, and you're not.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That'll be a surprise to him.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Andrew Yang?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Come on, guys.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: This is why presidential debates are becoming unwatchable.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Yeah.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"This reminds everybody of what they cannot stand about Washington, scoring points against each other, poking at each other, and telling each other that  my plan, your plan.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, we all have different visions for what is better...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Yeah, that's called the Democratic primary election, Pete.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's called an election.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's an election.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You know?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: This is what we're here for.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's an election.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Yes, but a house  a house divided cannot stand.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And that is not how we're going to win this.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, everyone, we know we're on the same team here.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We know we're on the same team.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We all have a better vision for health care than our current president.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And I believe we're talking about this the wrong way.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"As someone who has run a business, I know that our current health care system makes it harder to hire people, makes it harder to give them benefits and treat them as full-time employees.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You instead pretend their contractors.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's harder to change jobs.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's certainly harder to start a business.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The pitch we have to make to the American people is, we will get the health care weight off of your backs and then unleash the hopes and dreams of the American people.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Senator Booker...\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Now, I am Asian, so I know a lot of doctors, and they tell me that they spend a lot of time on paperwork, avoiding being sued, and navigating the insurance bureaucracy.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We have to change the incentives so instead of revenue and activity, people are focused on our health in the health care system.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And the Cleveland Clinic, where they're paid not based upon how many procedures they prescribe  shocker  they prescribe fewer procedures, and patient health stays the same or improves.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That is the pitch to the American people.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Booker, close out this discussion.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Thank you very much.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, there are a lot of people watching at home right now, listening to us that are afraid because they are in crisis.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They don't have health insurance.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Their health insurance doesn't go far enough.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They can't afford their prescription drugs.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, I'm clear in what I believe.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I believe it's the best way to rationalize the system.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But dear God, I know every one of my colleagues on this stage is in favor of universal health coverage and comes at this with the best of intentions.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And I'll tell you, there is an urgency right now in this nation.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Everybody feels it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And as a person who has an ideal, I know we cannot sacrifice progress on the altar of purity, because people in my community, they need help right now.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They have high blood pressure right now.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They have unaffordable insulin right now.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And this must be a moment where we as Democrats can begin to show that we cannot only stake and stand our ground, but find common ground, because we've got one shot to make Donald Trump a one-term president.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And we cannot lose it by the way we talk about each other or demonize and degrade each other.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We can walk and chew gum at the same time.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If I am the leader, I will work towards the ideal of health insurance, health coverage being a right for all Americans.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But every single day, I'll join with other Democrats to make progress happen in our nation for the people that are struggling and suffering today.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Candidates, thank you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Linsey Davis?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Thanks, George.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Since we're here at an HBCU, I'd like to start with young black voters.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Several recent polls indicate their number-one concern is racism.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"This campus, this state, and this nation are still raw from that racially motivated attack on Latinos in El Paso.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Now, we know that the racial divide started long before President Trump and President Obama, but each of you on this stage has said that President Trump has made that divide worse.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Congressman O'Rourke, coming to you first, why are you the most qualified candidate to address this divide?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You know, I called this out in no uncertain terms on August 3rd and every day since then.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And I was talking about it long before then, as well.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Racism in America is endemic.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It is foundational.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We can mark the creation of this country not at the Fourth of July, 1776, but August 20, 1619, when the first kidnapped African...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)
