text: ... was brought to this country against his will and in bondage and as a slave built the greatness and the success and the wealth that neither he nor his descendants would ever be able to fully participate in and enjoy.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We have to be able to answer this challenge.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And it is found in our education system, where in Texas, a 5-year-old child in kindergarten is five times as likely to be disciplined or suspended or expelled based on the color of their skin.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"In our health care system, where there's a maternal mortality crisis three times as deadly for women of color, or the fact that there's 10 times the wealth in white America than there is in black America.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I'm going to follow Sheila Jackson Lee's lead and sign into law a reparations bill that will allow us to address this at its foundation.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: But we will also call out the fact that we have a white supremacist in the White House and he poses a mortal threat to people of color all across this country.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Secretary Castro, 45 seconds to respond.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, you know, I want to commend Beto for how well he has spoken to the passion and the frustration and the sadness after what happened in his hometown of El Paso.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: He's done a great job with that.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, a few weeks ago, a shooter drove 10 miles inspired by this  10 hours inspired by this president to kill people who look like me and people who look like my family.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"White supremacy is a growing threat to this country, and we have to root it out.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I'm proud that I put forward a plan to disarm hate.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I'm also proud that I was the first to put forward a police reform plan, because we're not going to have any more Laquan McDonalds or Eric Garners or Michael Browns or Pamela Turners or Walter Scotts or Sandra Bland, here from the Houston area.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We need to root out racism, and I believe that we can do that, because that doesn't represent the vast majority of Americans who do have a good heart.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"They also need a leader to match that, and I will be a president that matches that.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Booker, you have said, quote, \"\"The real question isn't who is or isn't a racist.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"It's who is going to do something about it.\"\"\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator, what do you plan to do about it?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Well, first and foremost, I want to hit that point, because we know Donald Trump's a racist, but there is no red badge of courage for calling him that.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Racism exists.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: The question isn't who isn't a racist.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's who is and isn't doing something about racism.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And this is not just an issue that started yesterday.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's not just an issue that we hear a president that can't condemn white supremacy.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We have systemic racism that is eroding our nation from health care to the criminal justice system.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And it's nice to go all the way back to slavery, but dear God, we have a criminal justice system that is so racially biased, we have more African-Americans under criminal supervision today than all the slaves in 1850.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: This is the existential crisis of our time.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We have to come at this issue attacking systemic racism, having the courage to call it out, and having a plan to do something about it.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If I am president of the United States, we will create an office in the White House to deal with the problem of white supremacy and hate crimes.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And we will make sure that systemic racism is dealt with in substantive plans, from criminal justice reform to the disparities in health care to even one that we don't talk about enough, which is the racism that we see in environmental injustice in communities of color all around this country.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Mayor Buttigieg, you've been struggling with issues around race in your own community.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You've also said that anyone who votes to re-elect President Trump is, at best, looking the other way on racism.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Does that sort of talk alienate voters and potentially deepen divisions in our country?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I believe what's deepened divisions in the country is the conduct of this president, and we have a chance to change all of that.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, systemic racism preceded this president, and even when we defeat him, it will be with us.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's why we need a systemic approach to dismantle it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"It's  it's not enough to just take a racist policy, replace it with a neutral one and expect things will just get better on their own.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Harms compound.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"In the same way that a dollar saved compounds, so does a dollar stolen.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And we know that the generational theft of the descendants of slaves is part of why everything from housing to education to health to employment basically puts us in two different countries.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I have proposed the most comprehensive vision to tackle systemic racism in every one of these areas, marshaling as many resources as went into the Marshall plan that rebuilt Europe, but this time, a Douglass plan that we invest right here at home, to make sure that we're not only dealing with things like the over-incarceration of black Americans, but also black solutions, entrepreneurship, raising to 25 percent...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"... the target for the federal government to do business with minority-owned businesses, investing in HBCUs that are training and educating the next generation of entrepreneurs.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We can and must do that.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But that means transcending this framework that pits us against each other, that pits a single black mother of three against a displaced auto worker.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Because when I  where I come from, a lot of times that displaced auto worker is a single black mother of three.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We've got to say that...\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: ... and bring people together.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Also a concern for people of color is criminal justice reform.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Harris, you released your plan for that just this week.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And it does contradict some of your prior positions.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Among them, you used to oppose the legalization of marijuana; now you don't.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You used to oppose outside investigations of police shootings; now you don't.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You've said that you changed on these and other things because you were, quote, \"\"swimming against the current, and thankfully the currents have changed.\"\"\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But when you had the power, why didn't you try to effect change then?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I made sure that we dealt with redlining; banks should have to lend where they operate, et cetera.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So, there have been  there have been  I'm glad you asked me this question, and there have been many distortions of my record.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Let me be very clear.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I made a decision to become a prosecutor for two reasons.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"One, I've always wanted to protect people and keep them safe.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And second, I was born knowing about how this criminal justice system in America has worked in a way that has been informed by racial bias.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And I could tell you extensively about the experiences I and my family members have personally had.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But I made a decision that, if I was going to have the ability to reform the system, I would try to do it from the inside.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And so I took on the position that allowed me, without asking permission, to create one of the first in the nation initiatives that was a model and became a national model around people who were arrested for drugs and getting them jobs.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I created one of the first in the nation requirements that a state law enforcement agency would have to wear cameras and keep them on full-time.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I created one of the first in the nation trainings for a police officer on the issue of racial bias and the need to reform the system.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Was I able to get enough done?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Absolutely not.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But my plan has been described by activists as being a bold and comprehensive plan that is about ending mass incarceration, about taking the profit out of the criminal justice system.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I plan on shutting down for-profit prisons on day one.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"It will be about what we need to do to hold law enforcement, including prosecutors, accountable.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And finally, my plan is about making sure that, in America's criminal justice system, we de-incarcerate women and children, that we end solitary confinement and that we work on keeping families intact.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And as president of the United States, knowing the system from the inside, I will have the ability to be an effective leader and get this job complete.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Thank you, Senator Harris.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Klobuchar, during your eight years as a prosecutor in Minnesota, there were dozens of incidents where black men were killed by police.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Critics say that too often you sided with police in these cases.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: The ACLU's legal director in Minnesota has said that you showed no interest in racial justice.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Do you wish now that you had done more?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's not my record.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We are here at a historically black college.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And I think of an alum of that college, Barbara Jordan, and something that she once said.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"She said, \"\"What the people want is simple; they want a country as good as its promise.\"\"\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And that same can be said of the criminal justice system.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So when I was there, the way we handled these police shootings, I actually took a stand to make sure outside investigators handled them.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I took on our major police chief in Minneapolis.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But in the prosecutor's office, they were handled with a grand jury.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's how they were all handled across our state.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I now believe it is better for accountability if the prosecutor handles them and makes those decisions herself.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"That aside, I am proud of the work our staff did, 400 people in our office.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The cases that came to us, the African-American community that came to us, they said there was no justice for their little kids.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: There was a kid named Byron Phillips that was shot on his front porch.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: No one had bothered to figure out who did it.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"When I came into that office, we worked with the community groups; we put up billboards; we found the shooter and we put him in jail.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We did the same for the killer of a little girl named Tyesha Edwards who was doing her homework at her kitchen table and was shot through the window.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: What changes did we make?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Go after white-collar crimes in a big way, diversity the office in a big way, work with the Innocence Project to make sure we do much better with eyewitness ID.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And as a senator and as your president, I will make sure that we don't just do the First Step Act when it comes to criminal sentencing, that we move to the Second Step Act, which means the 90 percent of people that are incarcerated in local and state jails, let's reduce those sentences for nonviolent offenders and let's get them jobs and let them vote when they get out of prison.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Thank you, Senator Klobuchar.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You all believe that the war on drugs has put too many Americans behind bars.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Vice President Biden, you have a plan to release many nonviolent drug offenders from prison.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Senator Booker says that your plan is not ambitious enough.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Your response?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Well, first of all, let me say that, when I came back from law school, I had a job with a great  a big-time law firm.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I left and became a public defender because my state was under siege when Dr. King was assassinated.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We were occupied by the National Guard for 10 months.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I've been involved from the beginning.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"As a young congressman  as a young councilman, I introduced legislation to try to keep them from putting a sewer plant in a poor neighborhood.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: There has been a sea change.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: The fact of the matter is that what's happened is that we're in a situation now where there are so many people who are in jail and shouldn't be in jail.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: The whole means by which this should change is the whole model has to change.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We should be talking about rehabilitation.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Nobody should be in jail for a nonviolent crime.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"As  when we were in the White House, we released 36,000 people from the federal prison system.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Nobody should be in jail for a drug problem.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They should be going directly to a rehabilitation.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We build more rehabilitation centers, not prisons.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We  I'm the guy that put in the drug courts to divert people from the criminal justice system.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And so we have to change the whole way we look at this.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"When we put people in prison, we have to equip them that when they get out  nobody who got in prison for marijuana, for example, immediately upon being released  they shouldn't be in there; that should be a misdemeanor.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They should be out and their record should be expunged.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Every single right should be returned.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"When you finish your term in prison, you should be able not only to vote but have access to Pell grants, have access to be able to get housing...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: ... have access to be able to move along the way.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I've laid out a detailed plan along those lines.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And the fact is, we've learned so much more more...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Thank you, Mr. Vice President.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Thank you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Booker, 45 seconds to respond.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Our criminal justice system is so savagely broken.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"There's no difference in America between blacks, whites and Latinos for using drugs or dealing drugs.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But if you are African-American, you are almost four times more likely to be arrested and incarcerated, destroying your lives.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And so much of this comes down to privilege.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"They said 'I'm going to issue an executive order.'\"\"\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We have a criminal justice system that Brian Stephenson says treats you better if you're rich and guilty than if you're poor and innocent.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And so I have challenged this whole field.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We can specifically and demonstrably now show that there are 17,000 people unjustly incarcerated in America, and all of us should come forward and say, when we are president of the United States; when I am president of the United States, we will release them.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I joined together and led in the United States Senate the only major bipartisan bill to pass under this president, for criminal justice reform, that has already led to thousands of people coming out of jail.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If 87 members of the United States Senate says that these sentences are way too long, and we changed it, but we didn't make it retroactive, we could literally point to the people that are in jail unjustly right now.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Everyone on this stage should say that we are going to give clemency to these 17,000 people.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And I challenge you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Don't just say a big statement; back it up with details of the people in prison right now looking for one of the most sacrosanct ideals of this nation, which is liberty and freedom.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We need to reform this system and we must do it now.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Every day we wait is too long.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Thank you, Senator Booker.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: David?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Thank you, Linsey.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want to turn to the deadly mass shootings here in this country.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And of course we are all mindful tonight of where we stand.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We are here in Texas tonight, where 29 people have lost their lives in just the last month alone, El Paso, which we've discussed; in Odessa.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And I know there are survivors from El Paso right here in the hall tonight.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Vice President Biden, I do want to direct this to you, because we all remember Sandy Hook.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Twenty-six people died in that school, 20 of them children.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Those first graders would be in eighth grade today.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"At the time, there was a groundswell in this country to get something done.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: President Obama asked you to lead the push for gun control.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You have often pointed to your ability to reach across the aisle to get things done, but four months after Sandy Hook, a measure to require expanded background checks died on the Senate floor.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If you couldn't get it done after Sandy Hook, why should voters give you another chance?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Because I got it done before.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I'm the only one up here that's ever beat the NRA only one ever to beat the NRA nationally.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I'm the guy that brought the Brady bill into  into focus and became law.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And so that's number one.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Number two, after Sandy Hook, a number of things happened.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It went from a cause to a movement.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Look what's happened now.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Mothers  the organization  mothers against violence  gun violence.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We've seen what's happened again.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Now we have all these young people marching on Washington, making sure that things are going to change.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Those proposals I put forward for the president had over 50 percent of gun  of gun  of members of the NRA supporting them, and overwhelmingly the rest of the people supporting them.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Now the numbers are much higher, because they realize what I've been saying and we've all been saying is correct.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Over 90% of the American people think we have to get assault weapons off the street  period.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And we have to get buy-backs and get them out of their basements.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So the point is, things have changed.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And things have changed a lot.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And now what's happening is  and, by the way, the way Beto handled  excuse me for saying Beto.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: What the congressman...\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's all right.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Beto's good.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The way he handled what happened in his hometown is meaningful, to look in the eyes of those people, to see those kids...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"... to understand those parents, you understand the heartache.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: But this is the problem.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We are ready to do this.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Mr. Vice President...\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: This is the problem.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Thank you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: ... you did bring up assault weapons here.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You did bring up assault weapons here, and many of you on this stage have talked about executive order.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Harris, you have said that you would take executive action on guns within your first 100 days...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Correct.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: ... including banning imports of AR-15 assault weapons.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's right.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"President Obama, after Sandy Hook, more than 23 executive actions, and yet here we all are today.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"In recent days former Vice President Biden has said about executive orders, \"\"Some really talented people are seeking the nomination.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Biden saying, \"\"There's no constitutional authority to issue that executive order when they say 'I'm going to eliminate assault weapons,'\"\" saying, \"\"you can't do it by executive order any more than Trump can do things when he says he can do it by executive order.\"\"\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Does the vice president have a point there?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Some things you can.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Many things you can't.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Let's let the senator answer.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Well, I mean, I would just say, hey, Joe, instead of saying, no, we can't, let's say yes, we can.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Let's be constitutional.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We've got a Constitution.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And yes, we can, because I'll tell you something.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The way that I think about this is, I've seen more autopsy photographs than I care to tell you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I have attended more police officer funerals than I care to tell you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I have hugged more mothers of homicide victims than I care to tell you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And the idea that we would wait for this Congress, which has just done nothing, to act, is just  it is overlooking the fact that every day in America, our babies are going to school to have drills, elementary, middle and high school students, where they are learning about how they have to hide in a closet or crouch in a corner if there is a mass shooter roaming the hallways of their school.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I was talking about this at one of my town halls, and  and this child who was eight years old, probably, came up to me  it was like it was a secret between the two of us, and he tugged on my jacket and he said, \"\"I had to have one of those drills.\"\"\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It is traumatizing our children.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"El Paso  and, Beto, God love you for standing so courageously in the midst of that tragedy.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You know, people asked me...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"... in El Paso  they said, you know, because I have a long-standing record on this issue.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"They said, \"\"Well, do you think Trump is responsible for what happened?\"\"\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And I said, \"\"Well, look, I mean, obviously, he didn't pull the trigger, but he's certainly been tweeting out the ammunition.\"\"\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Harris, thank you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Vice President Biden, do you still stand by what you said on an executive order?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"No, what I said was  the question  speak to constitutional scholars.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If in fact we could say, \"\"By the way, you can't own the following weapons, period; they cannot be sold anymore\"\"  check with constitutional scholars.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Now, you can say...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Mr. Vice President, thank you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Congressman O'Rourke, I want to get to you on this.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"John, could I tell you what you could do in 100 days?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I'm going to  I'm going to work down the row here.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But I do want to come to Congressman O'Rourke, because I know this is personal to you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: El Paso is your hometown.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Some on this stage have suggested a voluntary buy-back for guns in this country.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You've gone further.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You've said, quote, \"\"Americans who own AR-15s and AK-47s will have to sell them to the government, all of them.\"\"\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You know that critics call this confiscation.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Are you proposing taking away their guns?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And how would this work?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I am, if it's a weapon that was designed to kill people on a battlefield...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If the high impact, high velocity round, when it hits your body, shreds everything inside of your body, because it was designed to do that, so that you would bleed to death on a battlefield and not be able to get up and kill one of our soldiers.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"When we see that being used against children, and in Odessa, I met the mother of a 15-year-old girl who was shot by an AR-15, and that mother watched her bleed to death over the course of an hour because so many other people were shot by that AR-15 in Odessa and Midland, there weren't enough ambulances to get to them in time, hell, yes, we're going to take your AR-15, your AK-47.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We're not going to allow it to be used against our fellow Americans anymore.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Congressman, thank you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And I want to say this.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I'm listening to the people of this country.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The day after I proposed doing that, I went to a gun show in Conway, Arkansas, to meet with those who were selling AR-15s and AK-47s and those who were buying those weapons.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And you might be surprised, there was some common ground there, folks who said, I would willingly give that up, cut it to pieces, I don't need this weapon to hunt, to defend myself.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It is a weapon of war.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So, let's do the right thing, but let's bring everyone in America into the conversation, Republicans, Democrats, gun-owners, and non-gun owners alike.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: May I make a point?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Congressman, thank you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I want to bring in Senator Klobuchar on this, because you've often talked about your uncle and the proud hunters back home in Minnesota.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: So I wanted to get your response to Congressman O'Rourke tonight.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Where do you stand on mandatory gun buybacks?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I so appreciate what the congressman's been doing.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And I want to remind people here that what unites us is so much bigger than what divides us.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Everyone up here favors an assault weapon ban.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Everyone up here favors magazine limitations, which, by the way, would have made a huge difference if that was in place in El Paso, in that store, where all those ordinary people showed such extraordinary courage.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And certainly in Dayton, Ohio, where in 30 seconds, one man guns down innocent people.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The cops got there in one minute, and it still wasn't enough to save those people.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's what unites us.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You know what else unites us?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And I'll tell you this.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"What unites us is that right now, on Mitch McConnell's desk, are three bills  universal background checks, closing the Charleston loophole, and passing my bill to make sure that domestic abusers don't get AK-47s.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Senator Klobuchar?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: So if we want to get something done  and I personally think we should start with a voluntary buyback program.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"That's what I think, David.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"But I want to finish this, because if you want action now, if you want action now, we got to send a message to Mitch McConnell.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We can't wait until one of us gets in the White House.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We have to pass those bills right now to get this done.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Senator Klobuchar...\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Because we cannot spare another innocent life.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Thank you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Thank you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I want to turn to Senator Booker, because you have said just this week about guns and about the candidates on this stage, that the differences do matter.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Those were your words.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You have argued, if you need a license to drive a car in this country, you should have a license to buy a gun.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Gun-owners would not only have to pass a background check, they would have to obtain a federal license to buy a gun.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"This would require, as you know, Congress to pass legislation.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If Democrats can't get universal background checks, how would you get this done?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And can you name one Republican colleague of yours in the Senate right now who would be onboard with this idea?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So, background checks and gun licensing, these are agreed to by overwhelmingly the majority of Americans.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Eighty-three percent of Americans agree with licensing.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: This is the issue.\r

text: \"Look, I grew up in the suburbs.\"\r

text: \"It was about 20 years ago that I came out of my home when I moved to inner city Newark, New Jersey, and witnessed the aftermath of a shooting.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"It's one of the reasons why shooting after shooting after shooting in neighborhoods like mine for decades, this has been a crisis for me.\"\r

text: It's why I was the first person to come out for gun licensing.\r

text: And I'm happy that people like Beto O'Rourke are showing such courage now and coming forward and also now supporting licensing.\r

text: But this is what I'm sorry about.\r

text: I'm sorry that it had to take issues coming to my neighborhood or personally affecting Beto to suddenly make us demand change.\r

text: This is a crisis of empathy in our nation.\r

text: That's not what I said.\r

text: Governor Bullock, your response?
title: 3rd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate

text: We are never going to solve this crisis if we have to wait for it to personally affect us or our neighborhood or our community before we demand action.\r

text: You want to know how we get this done?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We get this done by having a more courageous empathy, where people don't wait for this hell to visit upon their communities.\"\r

text: \"They stand up and understand the truth of what King said, that injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I will lead change on this issue, because I have seen what the carnage creates in communities like mine, because we forget, national shootings, these mass shootings are tragedies, but the majority of the homicide victims come from neighborhoods like mine.\"\r

text: \"Senator Booker, thank you.\"\r

text: \"The question we need to ask is, when we've got this much support across the country, 90 percent of Americans want to see us do  I like registration  want to see us do background checks, want to get assault weapons off the streets, why doesn't it happen?\"\r

title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Make sure that there is accountability and justice for the seven lives lost under our care and our custody, but also face the fact that Democrats and Republicans alike voted to build a wall that has produced thousands of deaths of people trying to cross to join family or to work a job.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"That we have been part of deporting people, hundreds of thousands just in the Obama administration alone, who posed no threat to this country, breaking up their families.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Democrats have to get off the back foot, we have to lead on this issue, because we know it is right.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Legalize America, begin with those more than 1 million DREAMers, make them U.S. citizens right now in this, their true home country...\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"... and extend that to their parents, their sisters and their brothers, and ensure that we have a legal, safe, orderly system to come to this country and add to our greatness here.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Thank you.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: George.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Jorge, thank you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We're going to take a quick break.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"When we come back, national security, foreign policy, homeland security, the impact on American jobs and U.S. troops.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Live from Texas Southern University in Houston, the \"\"Democratic Debate.\"\"\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Welcome back.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We want to turn now to national security and the foreign policy issue that has such a direct impact here at home.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The U.S. relationship with China, trade, and President Trump's tariffs.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We received more than 100 questions from viewers wanting to know how all of you are going to handle these tariffs.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And, Mr. Yang, let me begin with you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Would you repeal the tariffs on your first day in office?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And if so, would you risk losing leverage in our trade relationship with China?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I would not repeal the tariffs on day one, but I would let the Chinese know that we need to hammer out a deal, because right now, the tariffs are pummeling producers and farmers in Iowa who have absolutely nothing to do with the imbalances that we have with China.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: A CEO friend of mine was in China recently and he said that he saw pirated U.S. intellectual property on worker workstations to the tune of thousands of dollars per head.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And he said, one, how can my workers compete against that?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And, two, think about all the lost revenue to American companies.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So, the imbalances are real.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: But we have to let the Chinese know that we recognize that President Trump has pursued an arbitrary and haphazard trade policy that has had victims on both sides.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So, no to repealing the tariffs immediately, but yes to making sure we come to a deal that addresses the concerns of American companies and American producers.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Mayor Pete, let me take that question  let me take that question to you, because you've seen President Trump's tweets.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: He says what's going to happen here is the Chinese are just going to wait him out so that they can get a Democrat who they can take advantage of.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: How do you think about China?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We've seen President Trump call President Xi both an enemy and a friend.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Well, the president clearly has no strategy.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"You know, when I first got into this race, I remember President Trump scoffed and said he'd like to see me making a deal with Xi Jinping.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I'd like to see him making a deal with Xi Jinping.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Is it just me, or was that supposed to happen in, like, April?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's one more example of a commitment not made.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"When that happens on the international stage, people take note, not just our competitors, our adversaries, but also our allies take note of the inability of the United States to keep its word or follow through on its plans.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And when that happens, there are serious consequences.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We saw it at the G7.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The leaders of some of the greatest powers and economies of the world sitting to talk about one of the greatest challenges in the world, climate change, and there was literally an empty chair where American leadership could have been.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The problem is, this is a moment when American leadership is needed more than ever, whether it's in Hong Kong, where those protesters for democracy need to know that they have a friend in the United States, or anywhere around the world where increasingly we see dictators throwing their weight around.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The world needs America, but it can't be just any America.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Would you repeal the tariffs?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I would have a strategy that would include the tariffs as leverage, but it's not about the tariffs.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, what's going on right now is a president who has reduced the entire China challenge into a question of tariffs, when what we know is that the tariffs are coming down on us more than anybody else and there's a lack of a bigger strategy.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Klobuchar, you've actually supported the tariffs on steel.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"What we've got right now, though, George, it's not a focused tariff on steel.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"What he has done here, he has assessed these tariffs on our allies.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: He has put us in the middle of this trade war and he is treating our farmers and our workers like poker chips in one of his bankrupt casinos.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And if we are not careful, he is going to bankrupt this country.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"One forecast recently says that it has already cost us 300,000 jobs, all right?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"There is soybeans that are mounting up in bins all over the Midwest, in my state of Minnesota and in Iowa.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: So what I think we need to do is to go back to the negotiating table  that's what I would do.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I wouldn't have put all these tariffs in place.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And I wouldn't have had a trade policy where on August 1st he announces he's going to have tariffs on $300 billion of goods, on August 13th, he cuts it in half, a week later, he says he's going to reduce taxes, the day after that, he says he's going to do it.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The leaders of the world are watching this, and it undermines our strength as a nation.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And, yes, we want fair trade, but we must work with the rest of the world.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And he has made a mockery of focused trade policy, which I think means enforcement, like we've done in northern Minnesota, passing bills, getting President Obama to do more on that, so that our workers can benefit, so we are importing, exporting goods and making sure that it's a competitive policy where our goal is that we are making things, inventing things, and exporting to the world.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: He is defeating that goal.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Secretary Castro, you actually, in one of the previous debates, identified China as the most serious national security threat to our country.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want to pick up on what Senator Klobuchar was saying.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: She said she would go back to the negotiating table.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The question is, what do you do for leverage?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Where do you get it?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Well, look, I agree with those who have said that this erratic, haphazard trade war is hurting American families.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"As Senator Klobuchar said, 300,000 American jobs.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's estimated that it's cost $600 to the average American family.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Just a couple of days ago, 60 percent of Americans said that they believe that we're in for a recession next year.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So when I become president, I would immediately begin to negotiate with China to ratchet down that trade war.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We have leverage there.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I also believe, though, that we need to return to a leader when it comes to things like human rights.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We have millions of Uighurs, for instance, in China that right now are being imprisoned and mistreated.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And in North Korea, this president is elevating a dictator.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We need to stop that.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We need to return to ensuring that America leads again on human rights.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"When it comes to this trade war, I would immediately begin ratcheting that trade war down.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We have leverage in that discussion.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Warren, let me bring you in on this conversation.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: President Obama signed the Trans-Pacific Partnership.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"In part, it was designed to rein in China, to bring China into some kind of regulation.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: What do you think he got wrong?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So our trade policy in America has been broken for decades, and it has been broken because it works for giant multinational corporations and not for much of anyone else.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"These are giant corporations that, shoot, if they can save a nickel by moving a job to a foreign country, they'll do it in a heartbeat.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And yet for decades now, who's been whispering in the ears of our trade negotiators?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Who has shaped our trade policy?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's been the giant corporations.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's been their lobbyists and their executives.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The way we change our trade policy in America is, first, the procedures.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Who sits at the table?\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want to negotiate trade with unions at the table.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want to negotiate it with small farmers at the table.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want to negotiate it with environmentalists at the table.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I want to negotiate with human rights activists at the table.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And you asked the question about leverage.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"If I can just respond to that one, the leverage, are you kidding?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Everybody wants access to the American market.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"That means that we have the capacity to say right here in America, you want to come sell goods to American consumers?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Then you got to raise your standards.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You've got to raise your labor standards.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You've got to raise your environmental standards...\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: ... so our companies can compete on a level playing field.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We can use trade not to undermine American workers and not to undermine American farms and not to undermine small businesses in this country.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We can use trade to help build a stronger economy.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Harris, how would your trade policy differ from President Obama's?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Well, first of all, I have no criticism of that more than just looking at where we are now, which is we've got a guy in the White House who has been erratic on trade policy.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"He conducts trade policy by tweet, frankly born out of his fragile ego.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"It has resulted in farmers in Iowa with soybeans rotting in bins, looking at bankruptcy.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"When we look at this issue, my trade policy, under a Harris administration, is always going to be about saying, we need to export American products, not American jobs.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And to do that, we have to have a meaningful trade policy.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I am not a protectionist Democrat.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Look, we need to sell our stuff.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And that means we need to sell it to people overseas.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That means we need trade policies that allow that to happen.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You asked earlier about China.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: It's a complicated relationship.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We have to hold China accountable.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"They steal our products, including our intellectual property.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They dump substandard products into our economy.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They need to be held accountable.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We also need to partner with China on climate and the crisis that that presents.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We need to partner with China on the issue of North Korea.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I am on  and I think the only person on this stage  the Senate Intelligence Committee and the Senate Homeland Security Committee.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We need a partner on the issue of North Korea.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: But the bottom line is this.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Donald Trump in office on trade policy, you know, he reminds me of that guy in \"\"The Wizard of Oz,\"\" you know, when you pull back the curtain, it's a really small dude?\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Okay.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I'm not even going to take the bait, Senator Harris.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: But I am going to take...\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Oh, George, it wasn't about you.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: I'm going to take this to Senator Sanders right now.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Well, there is a reason  there is a reason why, in the last 45 years, the average American today, despite an explosion of technology and worker productivity, is not making a penny more than he or she made 45 years ago.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And one of the reasons is that, for decades, we have had disastrous trade policies.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I got to say to my good friend, Joe Biden, Joe and I strongly disagree on trade.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"I helped lead the opposition to NAFTA and PNTR, which cost this country over 4 million good-paying jobs.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And what happened is people who had those jobs ended up getting other jobs making 50 percent of what they made in manufacturing.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"So Trump, obviously, hasn't a clue.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Trump thinks that trade policy is a tweet at 3 o'clock in the morning.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"What we have got to do is develop a trade policy that represents workers, represents the farmers in the Midwest and elsewhere, who are losing billions right now because of Trump's policy, a trade policy which understands that if a company shuts down in America and goes abroad, and then thinks they're going to get online to get a lucrative federal contract, under Bernie Sanders, they got another guess coming.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Vice President Biden, he invoked your name.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Yeah, well, look, we're either going to make policy or China's going to make the rules of the road.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We make up 25 percent of the world economy.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We need another 25 percent to join us.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: And I think Elizabeth  Senator Warren is correct.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: At the table has to be labor and at the table have to be environmentalists.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"The fact of the matter is, China  the problem isn't the trade deficit, the problem is they're stealing our intellectual property.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: The problem is they're violating the WTO.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: They're dumping steel on us.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's a different issue than whether or not they're dumping agricultural products on us.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"In addition to that, we're in a position where, if we don't set the rules, we, in fact, are going to find ourselves with China setting the rules.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And that's why you need to organize the world to take on China, to stop the corrupt practices that are underway.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Senator Booker, close out this round.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Sure.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"There's one point we're really missing on the stage right now, which is the fact that Donald Trump's America first policy is actually an America isolated, an America alone policy.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Exactly right.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"From trade to battling China to the global crisis of climate change, the challenges in the Middle East, he is pulling us away from our allies, out of the Iran deal, out of the Paris climate accords.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"And on trade, he's deciding to take on China, while at the same time taking on tariff battles with all of our allies.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: You literally have him using a national security waiver to put tariffs on Canada.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: Because the concern over Afghanistan is very similar to what we saw in Iraq when the troops came out.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"Now, look, I'm the only person on this stage that finds Trudeau's hair very menacing, but they are not a national security threat.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: We cannot go up against China alone.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"This is a president that has a better relationship with dictators, like Duterte and Putin, than he does with Merkel and Macron.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"We are the strongest nation on the planet Earth, and our strength is multiplied and magnified when we stand with our allies in common cause and common purpose.\"\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: That's how we beat China.\r
title: 2nd 2020 Democratic Party Primary Debate (B)

text: \"That's how we beat climate change on the planet Earth, and that's how American values are the ones that lead on issues of trade and workers' rights.\"\r
